item.source: Trying to make command here... PLEASE HELP!

item.title: Trying to make command here... PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

OK, I’m trying to convert a 508 command into a 317 recognizable command. Here’s what I have so far:
508 Code

[code]if(cmd[0].startsWith(“object”)){

p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX, p.absY, 0, 10);

} [/code]
317 Code

[code]if(command.startsWith(“object”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ghostly”)){

player.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)), 0, absX, absY, 0, 10);

} [/code]

And I got this error when I compiled…

client.java:8128: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class client player.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)), 0, absX, absY, 0, 10); ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

PLEASE HELP IF YOU CAN…

Read full topic
